categories: Category:Coruscant Security Force divisions and units

nodes.text: Coruscant Control was a space traffic central control for the Coruscant Security Force. It was in charge of monitoring the space traffic coming and leaving the Galactic Republic capital planet of Coruscant during the Great Galactic War and Cold War eras. Orbital security stations would call Control to report in. In 3653 BBY, an agent of CSF, Femi, reported to Coruscant Control from Orbital Security Station Six that all was clear. Moments later, the Sith Empire entered Coruscant space and began their invasion. As the Cold War continued, Coruscant Control was in charge of clearing starships leaving the Coruscant Spaceport.

Coruscant Control first appeared in the first issue of the opening arc of Star Wars: The Old Republic, Threat of Peace, a webcomic serving as a prequel to Star Wars: The Old Republic, a Massively multiplayer online role-playing game made by BioWare. It later also appeared in the game itself, which was released on December 20, 2011.
